headline: Huntington Ingalls: Policy Optimism May Be Overdone
summary: Huntington Ingalls faces declining revenue, unprofitable contracts, and debt challenges. See here to know why limited growth makes HII shares a sell.

headline: BAE Systems Secures $188M Deal for Amphibious Combat Vehicles
summary: BAESY clinches a contract for ACVs. The deal has been provided by the Marine Corps Systems Command, Quantico, VA.
